Class MavenUtils

java.lang.Object
nameExtractor.MavenUtils
public class MavenUtils extends Object
Utility class providing methods for handling Maven-related file operations, including path construction, temporary copies for compilation, and compiling Java source files while preserving the original file.

  • Method Details

    • buildSourceFilePath

      public static String buildSourceFilePath(String repoName, String originalFileName)
      Builds the full source file path for a Java file based on the repository name and the original file name. Replaces dots in package names with directory separators to create a proper file path.
      Parameters:
      repoName - the name of the repository where the file is located
      originalFileName - the original Java source file name including package notation (e.g., com.example.MyClass.java)
      Returns:
      the full file system path for the source file

    • buildTempCopyPath

      public static String buildTempCopyPath(String sourceFilePath)
      Builds a temporary copy path for a Java source file. This path is used to create a backup copy of the original file before compilation or modification.
      Parameters:
      sourceFilePath - the full path of the source file to create a temporary copy for
      Returns:
      the file system path of the temporary copy

    • compileAndRestoreFile

      public static void compileAndRestoreFile(String repoName, String sourceFilePath, com.github.javaparser.ast.CompilationUnit cu, String copyPath, String outputPath) throws IOException
      Compiles a Java source file and restores the original file after compilation. This method performs the following steps:
      1. Makes a temporary copy of the original source file.
      2. Overwrites the original file with the modified CompilationUnit content.
      3. Creates the output directory if it does not exist.
      4. Runs the Maven compile command.
      5. Restores the original source file from the temporary copy and deletes the temporary copy.
      Parameters:
      repoName - the name of the repository containing the source file
      sourceFilePath - the full path to the source file to be compiled
      cu - the CompilationUnit representing the Java source code
      copyPath - the path where the temporary copy of the source file is stored
      outputPath - the path to store compilation results (e.g., class files)
      Throws:
      IOException - if any I/O operation fails (file copy, deletion, or writing)

    • runCommand

      public static void runCommand(String repoName, String command, String outputPath)
      Executes a Maven command in the repository directory and writes both console output and command results to the specified output file.
      Parameters:
      command - Maven command to execute (e.g., "compile", "test")
      outputPath - File path where the Maven output will be appended
